summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarding the government's response to defense discovery requests in the Epstein case, along with the original defense requests, for review by chiefs.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.role: Defense attorney or individual making discovery request
persons.context: Appears as the author or subject of a discovery request attached to the email.

events.title: Government Receives Defense Discovery Letter
events.description: The government received a letter from the defense containing discovery requests.

events.title: Government Submits Discovery Response
events.description: The government prepared and submitted its response to the defense's discovery requests.

keyFacts: The document is an internal government email regarding discovery in the Epstein case.
The government's response to defense discovery requests was completed by February 21, 2020.
The defense's original requests were submitted via a letter dated January 24, 2020.
An individual named Michael Thomas is associated with the defense discovery request.
